classifications.name: United States Personal Data Policy
classifications.description: Detects personal data applicable to United States's Federal and State laws, including The Federal Trade Commission Act (FTC Act), the Financial Services Modernization Act (Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLB/GLBA)), the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA), the Fair and Accurate Credit Transactions Act (FACTA), among many others.

Description.Value: Detects personal data applicable to United States's Federal and State laws, including The Federal Trade Commission Act (FTC Act), the Financial Services Modernization Act (Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLB/GLBA)), the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA), the Fair and Accurate Credit Transactions Act (FACTA), among many others.

classifications.name: United States Social Security Number (SSN) and Taxpayer ID Policy
classifications.description: Detect United States taxpayer identification numbers.  This is typically the U.S. Social Security Number (SSN).

Name.Value: United States Social Security Number (SSN) and Taxpayer ID Policy

Description.Value: Detect United States taxpayer identification numbers.  This is typically the U.S. Social Security Number (SSN).

classifications.name: United States California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA) Policy
classifications.description: Detects individually identifiable medical information for United States California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA), specified in California Civil Code §§56.

Name.Value: United States California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA) Policy

Description.Value: Detects individually identifiable medical information for United States California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA), specified in California Civil Code §§56.

classifications.name: United States Sensitive Data Policy
classifications.description: Detects sensitive data for the United States as defined by the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (CCPA).

Description.Value: Detects sensitive data for the United States as defined by the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (CCPA).

classifications.name: United States National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) 800-171 Policy
classifications.description: Detect forms and terms relating to the U.S. National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) 800-171 publication.

Name.Value: United States National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) 800-171 Policy

Description.Value: Detect forms and terms relating to the U.S. National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) 800-171 publication.

classifications.name: United States California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) Sensitive Personal Information (SPI) Policy
classifications.description: Detects U.S.- and California-centric sensitive personal information (SPI) in support of U.S. California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) of 2020.

Name.Value: United States California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) Sensitive Personal Information (SPI) Policy

Description.Value: Detects U.S.- and California-centric sensitive personal information (SPI) in support of U.S. California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) of 2020.
